service_name: Website and web mapping technology cloud application build and configuration
page_content:
exeGesIS Spatial Data Management

Website and web mapping technology cloud application build and configuration

We offer rapid and cost-effective build and configuration of bespoke business solutions using cloud-based website and web mapping technologies. This service covers the configuration, enhancement and extension of CMSi, CAMS and HBSMR SaaS, as well as other systems and solutions. An effective way of disseminating data or increasing public engagement.

Features

  • Website delivery though cloud environment, with backend cloud-based database
  • Open source website Content Management System (CMS) and components
  • Consultation and production of customer approved web system specification
  • Website skinning to match the customer’s corporate style
  • Database (RDBMS) configuration, especially with geospatial components
  • Creation and configuration of customer specified web mapping system
  • Web Map Toolkit and OpenLayers based online GIS functionality
  • Collation, cleaning, processing and uploading of customer supplied data
  • Creation of client only administration functionality, allowing analysis and statistics
  • Website content and functionality review, testing and publishing services

Benefits

  • Over 20 years’ experience creating and supplying environmental software solutions
  • Technical expertise in ASP.NET, JQuery, SQL Server, PostgreSQL/PostGIS, mojoPortal
  • Spatial data and GIS expertise: ArcGIS, MapInfo, QGIS, GRASS
  • Expertise in environmental, biodiversity, conservation, public access and heritage sectors
  • Data management for designated sites: SACs, SPAs, RAMSAR, SSSI, NNR
  • Data management for PROW, National Trails, access land, National Parks
  • Data management for Listed Buildings, Scheduled Monuments, Parks and Gardens
  • Data management for ecology, marine and terrestrial habitats and species
  • Expert consultancy support available for complex data processing and migration
  • Flexible scalable hosting arrangements, including Azure; secure backup and recovery

Pricing

£538 to £585 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Day
